TRAILERS

by
March 20, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Now take her heart from her chest and then..." "I shall have it all." Entertainment Squad & The Horror Collective have unveiled an official trailer for a B-movie horror remix of the iconic Snow White story called The Death of Snow White. Yet another of these public domain horror mashups, taking iconic characters and making them dark & evil. Pursued by her stepmother for eternal beauty, Snow White flees into a scary forest and aligns with seven bloodthirsty dwarves - cold-blooded assassins with a knack for brutal killings. Her spirit is tested in this grim fairy tale. As secrets unravel and betrayal surfaces, they realize the darkness that lurks beneath the surface of their seemingly idyllic kingdom. With twists and turns at every corner, they must navigate through danger to seek justice and avenge their friend's tragic end. Starring Sanae Loutsis, with Chelsea Edmundson, Tristan Nokes, Meredith Binder, Colin Miller, Dillon Moore, Jeremy Hallam, Michael DeSanto II, Risa Mei, and Eric Pope. "Fairy tales have always had a dark side, and The Death of Snow White embraces that in a bold, terrifying way." Sure, okay. But why does it look so bad?

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Jason Brooks' horror The Death of Snow White, from YouTube:

Hunted by her evil stepmother, Snow White (featuring Sanae Loutsis as this iconic fairy tale character) must overcome the horrors of the dark forest and make unlikely friends with 7 murderous dwarves in this dark retelling of the classic fairy tale. The Death of Snow White is directed by American horror writer / actor / SFX artist / filmmaker Jason Brooks, director of the indie horror movies Missing Girl: The Carrie Burke Story and Friday the 13th Vengeance 2: Bloodlines previously. The screenplay is written by Jason Brooks and Naomi Mechem-Miller. Produced by Eric Michael Kochmer, Charles Bunce, Kayli Fortun, Jason Brooks, Naomi Mechem-Miller, Kody Newton, and Sharif Ibrahim. Made by Real Fiction Studios based in the Pacific Northwest. Entertainment Squad will debut Jason Brooks' The Death of Snow White horror film in select US theaters starting on April 18th, 2025 coming up this spring. Anyone want to actually watch?
